step0.title: Create Your Identity
step0.subTitle: Welcome! Let's Get Started: Establish Your User And Claim Your Page
step0.roleInputPLaceholder: Choose Your Role: Influencer, Brand, or Individual
step0.tootlip: This input will define your unique username or handle for your profile URL. It's like your personal identity on the platform, allowing others to easily find and access your page using this custom name. Choose something catchy and easy to remember, as this username will be a permanent representation of you on the platform. Have fun picking the perfect one!
step0.disclaimer: Please choose the options that best represent you or align with your preferences. Once selected, this information will be considered
